import axios from"axios";export default{// Gets all journals
getJournals:function getJournals(){return axios.get("/api/journals");},// Gets the book with the given id
getJournal:function getJournal(id){return axios.get("/api/journals/"+id);},// Deletes the book with the given id
deleteJournal:function deleteJournal(id){return axios.delete("/api/journals/"+id);},// Saves a book to the database
saveBook:function saveBook(journalData){return axios.post("/api/journals",journalData);}};
